display_name: Medical Outcomes Study SF-36: Emotional problems caused you to accomplish less than you would like
description:
Item from the Medical Outcomes Study Short Form 36 (SF-36). [Ware JE and Sherbourne CD, 1992 (PubMed ID: 1593914)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1593914/)

Original question: *During the past 4 weeks, have you had this problem with work or other regular daily activities because of emotional problems: Accomplished less than you would like*

[Search for all SF-36 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/shhs/variables?search=mossf36)
